text:
We are very fortunate to have Morris on our payroll and I
anticipate that our total local relationships will be greatly
Improved. Morris is a most effective person.
Confidential Addendum to Memo.
St. Louis continues to get a free ride and still is not a
member. St. Louis continues to call Morris collect and receive
other services without having contributed a sou in membership
dues. Conservatively I estimate we have spent $500.00 on
St. Louis. Somebody ought to get him in line.
